text: yes, we're a SaaS and we've hosted customer/community meetups in places where we've had in-person retreats. I would super highly recommend it. We kept ours super casual, we'd just meet up for a few hours at a bar/restaurant w a decent outdoor space. I don't think we even covered the tab. For all of the team it was a fun chance to meet real customers, and so good for roles like the dev team to get to associate their work with a real human.
